EmailTemplate.name: Netapp Follow Up - No Show & Attendee FU.Thank You for Joining Us Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Joining Us: NetApp ONTAP and VMTurbo: Aligning Virtualization with Storage – Live Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for joining us at our webinar, NetApp ONTAP and VMTurbo: Aligning Virtualization with Storage – Live Demo. We hope you found the content and discussion valuable. We’ve attached the link to the recorded webinar here http://bit.ly/1dibjwW. Feel free to share this with your colleagues. And if you have any questions or ideas, please contact us here. We welcome your suggestions and ideas.
Regards, Jonathan Reeve and Jim O’Donnell
